Regulation Name(s): Herpes Simplex Virus Nucleic Acid Amplification Assay
Specimen Container(s): Becton Dickinson Universal Viral Transport Media
Copan branded Universal Transport Medium for LabCorp
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MultiCode-RTx Herpes Simplex Virus 1 & 2 Kit, a PCR-based qualitative assay for detecting and typing HSV-1 & HSV-2 DNA in vaginal lesion swabs from symptomatic females
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative PCR test for detection and typing of HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in vaginal lesion swab specimens from symptomatic female patients as an aid in the diagnosis of genital herpes infection; not for use with CSF, lesions other than vaginal, male penile specimens, prenatal screening, or females under 18 years
